short_description: Devices used to detect and measure moisture levels in affected areas.
detailed_description: High-tech moisture detectors, hygrometers, and infrared cameras are utilized to precisely assess the extent of moisture saturation in walls, floors, and hidden spaces, ensuring thorough water damage evaluation and drying planning to prevent secondary damage.
features: Accurate moisture measurement, non-invasive infrared scanning, aids in determining drying strategy and progress.
